titleStmt.title: Eliza's babes, or, The virgins-offering being divine poems and meditations / written by a lady, who onely desires to advance the glory of God and not her own.
titleStmt.author: Lady, who onely desires to advance the glory of God, and not her own.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Laurence Blaiklock, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
